snippet: There are many fundamental reasons for believing that stock markets may have embarked on a long-term bull market comparable to those of the 1950s and 1960s or the 1980s and 1990s
lead_paragraph: There are many fundamental reasons for believing that stock markets may have embarked on a long-term bull market comparable to those of the 1950s and 1960s or the 1980s and 1990s

headline.main: Signs Point to an Extended Bull Market
headline.print_headline: Signs Point to an Extended Bull Market
